Siva Simha Malla definition

Search

Siva Simha Malla

Siva Simha Malla (died 1619), also known as Shiva Simha, was a Malla Dynasty King from Kathmandu. He became King of Kantipur in 1583 and in 1597, King Shiva Simha of Kathmandu conquered Lalitpur and he ruled both kingdoms as one then until his death in 1619. After his death in 1619, his domain was divided. ...

No exact match found.
